sentences.en: Don't equivocate with me I want a straight answer to a straight question!
sentences.cn: 别跟我绕弯子--我问的问题直截了当,回答也要直截了当!

sentences.en: He is equivocating a lot about what is going to happen if and when there are elections.
sentences.cn: 他含含糊糊地说着很多如果进行选举会发生的状况。

sentences.en: They waver while the latter stand firm, they equivocate while the latter are forthright.
sentences.cn: 前者动摇,后者坚定, 前者暧昧,后者明朗.

sentences.en: You can tell when they're stressed out, they'll equivocate and vacillate.
sentences.cn: 当他们压力过大时,你是可以辨别出来的, 因为他们会支支吾吾、犹豫不决.

words.tran_cn: 说模棱话的人；说话支吾者

trans.tran_cn: 说模棱两可的话, 支吾
trans.tran_en: to avoid giving a clear or direct answer to a question

trans.tran_cn: 使用模棱两可的话隐瞒真相，躲闪；推诿；含糊其词；说话支吾，态度暧昧
